description: This is a source code file for a Python module that generates C++ code for JSON-RPC communication, including functions to emit event handlers, register/unregister methods, and manage versioning. It Contains functions for code generation, interaction with external modules, and detailed logic for serializing and deserializing JSON data.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting an event, including the function prototype, JSON serialization, and notification logic based on the event parameters and context.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the header and initial code for the RPC C++ source file, including includes and namespace scoping.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespace blocks opened in prologue; finalizes the generated code block.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ code to define version constants for the RPC interface.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the bulk of the C++ source code for registering RPC methods, properties, and events, handling code for method invocation, serialization, and listener registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry to generate full RPC registration and event code, combining prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates code to embed version information into the RPC implementation.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
